text: Thomas Granville "Gran" Edwards (1920–1996) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for the Toledo Jim White Chevrolets in three games during the 1941–42 season and averaged 1.7 points per game. == References == Category:1920 births Category:1996 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Colorado Category:Centers (basketball) Category:People from Delta, Colorado Category:Toledo Jim White Chevrolets players Category:Western Colorado Mountaineers men's basketball players
title: Gran Edwards
